/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars, buses, and motorcycles, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the presence of trees lining the street.
